titles.title: Know Ye Not, Know Ye Not, Ye Are The Temple

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Know ye not, know ye not, ye are the temple.
Know ye not, know ye not, ye are the temple.
Know ye not, know ye not, ye are the temple.
Ye are the temple of the Holy Ghost.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Filled with power, filled with praise, filled with glory.
Filled with power, filled with praise, filled with glory.
Filled with power, filled with praise, filled with glory.
Ye are the temple of the Holy Ghost.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
No sabeis, no sabeis, que sois el templo. (3x)
Sois el templo del Espiritu de Dios.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Lleno de poder, alabanza, y gloria. (3x)
Sois el templo del Espiritu de Dios.
